From Wiki:

Metro 2033 is an upcoming action-oriented video game with a combination of survival horror, RPG, and first-person shooter elements. The game is based on the novel Metro 2033 by Russian author Dmitry Glukhovsky. It is developed by 4A Games in Ukraine and will be released in March 2010 for the Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows.[2] In March 2009, 4A Games announced a partnership with Glukhovsky to collaborate on the game.[3] The game was announced a few months later at the 2009 Games Convention in Leipzig;[4] a first trailer came along with the announcement.[5] When the game was announced, it had the subtitle The Last Refuge but this subtitle is no longer being used by THQ.
